text: Jerry Gordon Zucker (born March 11, 1950) is an American movie producer, director, and screenwriter. He is known for his role in directing comedy spoof movies such as Airplane! and Top Secret!. He also wrote the Best Picture- nominated supernatural drama movie Ghost. He and his older brother, David Zucker, worked on many movies together. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from Wisconsin Category:Movie producers from Wisconsin Category:Screenwriters from Wisconsin Category:Writers from Milwaukee
title: Jerry Zucker
